name: Untitled Death Game
description:
Made for the Monthly Scratch Jam #4 which was 2 days but I made this in one day because why not.

If you're struggling, press the mouse button to progress through the text.

Your mission: to die

Your instructor: left because his shift ended

Your tools: not functioning correctly

Your only hope: frantically press a button until the odds sway in your favor

Your time: will be spent well playing this video game*

*in theory
